data.title: Awards and Honors by Faculty
data.text:
James Francis Antaki

Susan K. McAdam Professor of Heart Assist Technology

2009 Fellow, American Institute of Medical and Biological Engineers (AIMBE)

2009 Steven Fenves Award for Systems Research

2003 August H. Koyanagi Young Investigator Award(11th Congress of the International Society for Rotary Blood Pumps)

2002 Fellow, American Institute for Medical and Biological Engineering (AIMBE)

2001 IEEE Control System Technology Award (shared with BE Paden, UCSB) for development of Streamliner maglev heart assist pump(IEEE)

1999 Elected one of "Pittsburgh Magazine 40 under 40" the top leaders in Pittsburgh under age 40.(Pittsburgh Magazine)

Lawrence Bonassar

Daljit S. and Elaine Sarkaria Professor, Meinig School of Biomedical Engineering and Sibley School of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering

2012 Plenary Speaker, World Forum for Spine Research

2010 Hansjorg Wyss Research Focus Award, AO Spine International, World Forum for Spine Research

2009 Fiona Ip Li ’78 and Donald Li ’75 Excellence in Teaching Award, Cornell University, College of Engineering

2009 Fellow, American Institute of Medical and Biological Engineers

2007 Zellman Warhaft Contribution to Diversity Award, Cornell University, College of Engineering

2006 Ralph S. Watts '72 Excellence in Teaching Award, Cornell University, College of Engineering
